text: Cultures coffee is gross! There's like a sour taste to it. Even after putting sugar in!
One of the staff members was doing a live FaceTime call while she was working with her back to the customers waiting for service.

Food is good and healthy. Not heavy on flavouring, seasoning or artificial stuff. It's just plain good healthy food! And they gave me free bottled water too!  It's a bit pricey tho but hey... Natural food has always been more pricey than processed food. I wish it was the other way around tho so everyone will make healthier choices.
